column1: Local Foods////Ordered to go. Be forewarned the parking is a nightmare especially because of local construction. Ordered posole
column3: Asian chicken salad and pastrami sandwich with slaw and chips. With the exception of the slaw all was fresh
column4: tasty and devoured quickly. Don't know why the slaw was off putting-too much sauce and odd flavor. Pastrami had a kick my husband was't expecting but he liked it. Will be back but next time I'll walk
